title: Bug 49536: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps are deployed
OB: When a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
EB: The server should return an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 instance from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL in the Tomcat 7 instance
4. Observe the server response and note that it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
